title: Print to Film
content:
Hello, I am a print designer, but have a video/film project coming up that I have to design/produce. I am familiar and love typography for print, but would anyone be kind enough to recommend some fonts (serif, slab and san) for both titles and credits? I am very grateful. Thanks in advance. Tips would be welcome as well ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20071009211804im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) I suppose kerning is much harder in film to judge by resolution.
